Welcome to Cerulean Towers

THE STORY UNFOLDS

Cerulean Towers is a revolution that Nigeria wants – a modern mixed-use development of commercial and residential resort in Lagos that befits the country’s ambitious vision. It is an icon of the future. Architecturally inspired by the sculpted beauty of seashells, which punctuate the shores of Victoria Island, as well as the artful personality of colonial houses of Ikoyi. 

DOWNLOAD BROCHURE

Your place in history

Outfitted with state-of-the-art fixtures, amenities and systems – befitting their Grade A status, The Cerulean Tower allows you to own your own luxury home in the Heart of Victoria Island (the business and financial hub of Lagos).

FRONT ROW SEATS

The Cerulean Tower is a Beauty set to redefine the skyline of Lagos State. Situated on Water Corporation Drive, off Ligali Ayorinde, Victoria Island. The Tower consists of mixed-use and residential blocks of Lagos Luxury homes. 

NGN 180,000,000

AN ENERGETIC ROUTINE

With specially designed residences, unique offices, luxury retail and boundless recreation opportunities – The Cerulean Tower is designed with the impeccable function to inspire through innovation.  

DOWNLOAD BROCHURE

DOWNLOAD BROCHURE

AVAILABLE UNITS

RESIDENCES, OFFICE SPACES & LUXURY RETAIL

Residents, workers and visitors alike are invited to enjoy an unrivalled 360-degree experience– one that is yet to be seen in the region, and a match for its global mixed-use counterparts. Whether overlooking the blue expanse of the Atlantic Ocean or the extensive greenery of Victoria Island – this is a community with an innate connection to Lagos, encouraging business synergy and convivial community.

VICTORIA ISLAND

THE ULTIMATE ADDRESS

Lagos, ‘the center of excellence’, encapsulates Nigeria’s evolution – it is an engine room behind the country’s drive towards the future. As the largest city on the African continent, with a population of about 21 million people – Lagos is a diverse and electric city that acts as a powerful business hub in the region and is one of the fastest growing cities in the world.
